member.name: M:Installer.InstallationManager.GetConnectionString(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates connection string to SQL server or its database.
member.param: Whether to create connection string to database

Indicates whether connection string should be build using named pipes. Named pipes are required when using LocalDB and .NET update 4.0.2 is being installed as a prerequisite. On the other hand named pipes don't work on a shared LocalDB instance used by the web application.

member.name: T:Installer.UninstallConfiguration
